verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Some trust in horses
Some trust in chariots
But I will trust in You alone
I once was fallen
But now I'm risen
And I stand
By the saving strength of Your right hand
I trust in Your name, O Lord
I trust in Your ways, O Lord
I trust in Your goodness
I trust in Your faithfulness
I trust in Your promises
I trust in Your word that says
You will complete Your work in me
Here I raise my Ebenezer
A banner of Your victory
I rejoice in Your salvation
For You have answered me
